name: Sweet Tooth (itch) (Nyela)
description:
Play as a cotton candy deliverer whose job is to collect all of the cotton clouds to form a giant cotton candy treat to give to the baby god that rules over your world.  Collect all the cotton clouds on the map to open up the portal gate at the end of the level to win!

Controls: AWSD movement, double-click spacebar to activate double jump and triple-click to activate triple jump,  hold down spacebar while jumping to activate gliding mechanic. Gliding is only available after the double and triple jumps. Hold down Shift to sprint and Ctrl to slow down the speed. Press esc to exit the game.
